smithMachine.notes: Face AWAY from angle direction. Bar should move UP and BACK on squat, TOWARD HEAD on press.

chest.notes: Machine pressing only due to pec injury history

shoulders.notes: Lateral/rear focus; front delts hit by pressing

biceps.notes: Direct sets; pulling adds partial volume

triceps.notes: Direct sets; pressing adds partial volume

posteriorChain.note: Legs A is quad-dominant, safe 24hr after deadlifts. Legs B requires 48-72hr.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Incline Press
exercises.notes: Angled Smith: face away from angle. Stop at 90° elbow. Never to failure.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.notes: Control eccentric. Safe for pec history.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover (Low to High)
exercises.notes: Targets upper chest fibers. Squeeze at top.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Seated or standing. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Constant tension. Slight forward lean.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
exercises.notes: Full stretch at bottom. Rope or bar attachment.

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
exercises.notes: Bar or rope. Full extension.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: External rotation at top. Rear delt and rotator cuff health.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Angled Smith: face away. Bar moves toward head.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Controlled tempo. Slight bend in elbows.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover (High to Low)
exercises.notes: Targets lower/mid chest. Different angle from Push A.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.notes: Incline setting if available for variation.

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck
exercises.notes: Rear delt isolation. Squeeze at contraction.

exercises.name: Assisted Dips
exercises.notes: Tricep focus - upright torso. Skip if shoulder discomfort.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
exercises.notes: Different attachment than Push A for variation.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Shoulder health and rear delt.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: Conventional or sumo. Rest 3-4 min between sets. TRIGGERS 48hr posterior chain recovery.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown (Wide Grip)
exercises.notes: Width focus. Full stretch at top.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row (Wide Grip)
exercises.notes: Squeeze shoulder blades. Width emphasis.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.notes: Alternating or simultaneous. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Cable Hammer Curl
exercises.notes: Rope attachment. Brachialis and forearm emphasis.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Rear delts and external rotation.

exercises.name: Smith Bent Over Row
exercises.notes: Angled Smith: face the angle so bar moves naturally. Thickness focus.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown (Close/Neutral Grip)
exercises.notes: Different grip than Pull A for fiber variation.

exercises.name: Straight Arm Pulldown
exercises.notes: Lat isolation. Keep arms straight.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shrug
exercises.notes: Trap development. Hold at top.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.notes: Incline or concentration for variation from Pull A.

exercises.name: Cable Reverse Curl
exercises.notes: Straight bar or angled cable attachment. Forearm/brachialis.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Rear delts and rotator cuff.

Legs A.safetyNote: This workout is QUAD-DOMINANT. Safe to perform 24hr after Pull A deadlifts because it minimizes posterior chain stress.

exercises.name: Leg Press (FEET LOW)
exercises.notes: FEET LOW on platform = QUAD focus. Minimizes hamstring/glute involvement. Safe after deadlifts.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.notes: Pure quad isolation. Full ROM, controlled eccentric.

exercises.name: Hip Adductor Machine
exercises.notes: Inner thigh. Often neglected.

exercises.name: Hip Abductor Machine
exercises.notes: Outer hip/glute medius. Important for leg symmetry.

exercises.name: Calf Raise (Standing Smith OR Leg Press)
exercises.notes: Standing = gastrocnemius emphasis. Full stretch at bottom.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Focus on spinal flexion, not hip flexion.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Lower abs. Controlled movement.

Legs B.safetyNote: This workout targets posterior chain. DO NOT perform within 48hr of Pull A deadlifts.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (Smith)
exercises.notes: Angled Smith: face angle direction. Hamstring stretch focus. TRIGGERS posterior chain recovery.

exercises.name: Leg Press (FEET HIGH)
exercises.notes: FEET HIGH on platform = glute/hamstring focus. Posterior chain emphasis.

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.notes: Lying or seated. Full ROM, squeeze at contraction.

exercises.name: Hip Adductor Machine
exercises.notes: Inner thigh development.

exercises.name: Hip Abductor Machine
exercises.notes: Glute medius and outer hip.

exercises.name: Calf Raise (Standing Smith OR Leg Press)
exercises.notes: Alternate between standing and leg press calf raises week to week.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Core stability for compound lifts.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.notes: Core endurance and stability.

Rest.notes: Active recovery: walking, stretching, foam rolling. Protein intake maintained.

rotation.notes: Legs A (quad focus) is safe 24hr after Pull A (deadlifts). Legs B (posterior focus) requires minimum 48hr gap from deadlifts - typically falls 4+ days after Pull A in this rotation.
rotation.recoveryLogic: Pull A → Legs A is safe (quads). Pull A → Legs B would need 48hr minimum (both hit posterior chain).

perWeek.chest: ~13 direct sets (Push A: 10, Push B: 6) - within 10-16 target
perWeek.back: ~16 direct sets (Pull A: 6 + DL, Pull B: 10) - within 14-20 target
perWeek.quads: ~11 direct sets (Legs A: 8, Legs B partial: 3) - within 12-16 target
perWeek.hamstrings: ~11 direct sets (DL: 4, Legs B: 7) - within 10-14 target
perWeek.biceps: ~12 direct sets (Pull A: 6, Pull B: 6) - within 10-16 target
perWeek.triceps: ~12 direct sets (Push A: 6, Push B: 6) + pressing - within 10-16 target
